word:
The minister should have a margin to work upon, for there are many calls made upon his financial resources. In his work he frequently finds people so 
                                                                           450
poor that they have little to eat and wear, and no proper sleeping accommodations. He must give succor to the very needy, to supply their hunger and cover their nakedness. He is also expected to lead out in good enterprises, to help in building churches, and in advancing the cause of God in other lands.
